column1: * Death of Ruling Steward Belecthor II of Gondor.
* The White Tree of Gondor dies
column2: and no seedling can be found. The Dead Tree is left standing.

column1: In editions prior to the The Lord of the Rings (50th Anniversary Edition) the information for this year in Appendix B was assigned to
column2: which contradicted the death of Belecthor II in 2872 found in Appendix A in the list of the dates of death of the ruling stewards.
